00015 #ifndef _FCGI_STDIO
00016 #define _FCGI_STDIO 1
00017 
00018 #include <stdio.h>

00020 #include "fcgiapp.h"

00025 
00026 #ifndef DLLAPI
00027 #ifdef _WIN32
00028 #define DLLAPI __declspec(dllimport)
00029 #else
00030 #define DLLAPI
00031 #endif
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 /*
00035  * Wrapper type for FILE
00036  */
00037 
00038 typedef struct {
00039     FILE *stdio_stream;
00040     FCGX_Stream *fcgx_stream;
00041 } FCGI_FILE;
00042 
00043 /*
00044  * The four new functions and two new macros
00045  */
00046 
00047 DLLAPI int FCGI_Accept(void);
00048 DLLAPI void FCGI_Finish(void);
00049 DLLAPI int FCGI_StartFilterData(void);
00050 DLLAPI void FCGI_SetExitStatus(int status);
00051 
00052 #define FCGI_ToFILE(fcgi_file) (fcgi_file->stdio_stream)
00053 #define FCGI_ToFcgiStream(fcgi_file) (fcgi_file->fcgx_stream)
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * Wrapper stdin, stdout, and stderr variables, set up by FCGI_Accept()
00057  */
00058 
00059 DLLAPI extern FCGI_FILE _fcgi_sF[];
00060 #define FCGI_stdin (&_fcgi_sF[0])
00061 #define FCGI_stdout (&_fcgi_sF[1])
00062 #define FCGI_stderr (&_fcgi_sF[2])
00063 
00064 /*
00065  * Wrapper function prototypes, grouped according to sections
00066  * of Harbison & Steele, "C: A Reference Manual," fourth edition,
00067  * Prentice-Hall, 1995.
00068  */
00069 
00070 DLLAPI void FCGI_perror(const char *str);
00071 
00072 DLLAPI FCGI_FILE *FCGI_fopen(const char *path, const char *mode);
00073 DLLAPI int        FCGI_fclose(FCGI_FILE *fp);
00074 DLLAPI int        FCGI_fflush(FCGI_FILE *fp);
00075 DLLAPI FCGI_FILE *FCGI_freopen(const char *path, const char *mode, FCGI_FILE *fp);
00076 
00077 DLLAPI int        FCGI_setvbuf(FCGI_FILE *fp, char *buf, int bufmode, size_t size);
00078 DLLAPI void       FCGI_setbuf(FCGI_FILE *fp, char *buf);
00079 
00080 DLLAPI int        FCGI_fseek(FCGI_FILE *fp, long offset, int whence);
00081 DLLAPI int        FCGI_ftell(FCGI_FILE *fp);
00082 DLLAPI void       FCGI_rewind(FCGI_FILE *fp);
00083 #ifdef HAVE_FPOS
00084 DLLAPI int        FCGI_fgetpos(FCGI_FILE *fp, fpos_t *pos);
00085 DLLAPI int        FCGI_fsetpos(FCGI_FILE *fp, const fpos_t *pos);
00086 #endif
00087 DLLAPI int        FCGI_fgetc(FCGI_FILE *fp);
00088 DLLAPI int        FCGI_getchar(void);
00089 DLLAPI int        FCGI_ungetc(int c, FCGI_FILE *fp);
00090 
00091 DLLAPI char      *FCGI_fgets(char *str, int size, FCGI_FILE *fp);
00092 DLLAPI char      *FCGI_gets(char *str);

00100  */

00128 /*
00129  * The remaining definitions are for application programs,
00130  * not for fcgi_stdio.c
00131  */
00132 
00133 #ifndef NO_FCGI_DEFINES
00134 
00135 /*
00136  * Replace standard types, variables, and functions with FastCGI wrappers.
00137  * Use undef in case a macro is already defined.
00138  */
00139 
00140 #undef  FILE
00141 #define FILE     FCGI_FILE
00142 
00143 #undef  stdin
00144 #define stdin    FCGI_stdin
00145 #undef  stdout
00146 #define stdout   FCGI_stdout
00147 #undef  stderr
00148 #define stderr   FCGI_stderr
00149 
00150 #undef  perror
00151 #define perror   FCGI_perror
00152 
00153 #undef  fopen
00154 #define fopen    FCGI_fopen
00155 #undef  fclose
00156 #define fclose   FCGI_fclose
00157 #undef  fflush
00158 #define fflush   FCGI_fflush
00159 #undef  freopen
00160 #define freopen  FCGI_freopen
00161

00164 #undef  setbuf
00165 #define setbuf   FCGI_setbuf
00166 
00167 #undef  fseek
00168 #define fseek    FCGI_fseek
00169 #undef  ftell
00170 #define ftell    FCGI_ftell
00171 #undef  rewind
00172 #define rewind   FCGI_rewind
00173 #undef  fgetpos
00174 #define fgetpos  FCGI_fgetpos
00175 #undef  fsetpos
00176 #define fsetpos  FCGI_fsetpos
00177 
00178 #undef  fgetc
00179 #define fgetc    FCGI_fgetc
00180 #undef  getc
00181 #define getc     FCGI_fgetc
00182 #undef  getchar
00183 #define getchar  FCGI_getchar
00184 #undef  ungetc
00185 #define ungetc   FCGI_ungetc
00186 
00187 #undef  fgets
00188 #define fgets    FCGI_fgets
00189 #undef  gets

00191 
00192 #undef  fputc

00194 #undef  putc
00195 #define putc     FCGI_fputc
00196 #undef  putchar
00197 #define putchar  FCGI_putchar
00198 
00199 #undef  fputs

00201 #undef  puts
